places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shikhar
address: Mall Rd, near Shikhar Tiraha (Crossroad),The, Paltan Bazar, Dharanaula, Almora, Uttarakhand 263601, India

reviews.text: This hotel was good. It had elevators to transport your bags. The location was also close to a lot of shops. But in the future, please include soaps and towels in the room. The rooms were old and not maintained properly. But outside on the top porch the city view looked beautiful! Also, they respond to calls quickly. Please make the rooms cleaner.

I've heard about this place because it's known for the oldest and best hotels in town. I went there once, it was late in the evening and i needed a place to stay, so my father recommended this hotel. I went inside and asked, I could not believe the off-season price were so high, anyway i thought to check out the room so I went with the guy in the lift who continuously stared me until we reached the room (the lift to was not in proper working mode). The room was big but it smelled like hell. It may be the biggest hotel but for me it was the worst one. Why build such thing when you can't maintain it? I feel pity for travellers and tourist who want hotel and even after paying good amount are not getting what they atleast deserve.

We stayed at hotel Shikhar for 6 nights and loved it. Our room was clean, bathroom very clean also, plenty of hot water, quiet, staff are friendly and helpful,and we are our meals at their inhouse restaurant and the food was delicious. We will stay here again when in Almora and will recommend to our friends. Thankyou for such a lovely stay.

Fine hotel, conveniently located at the Mall road near the roadways bus stand. Rooms are fine with basic facilities, do not expect much. Food prices are at a higher rate. Service at hotel and behaviour of the staff is good.

Very dirty rooms, food quality is very poor.
Bed sheets, blankets were full of dust, toilet is so dirty that we avoided taking bath. Quality of food is very poor.
Only advantage is the location.

fine hotel conveniently located mall road near roadways bus stand rooms fine basic facilities expect much food prices higher rate service hotel behaviour staff good
dirty rooms food quality poor bed sheets blankets full dust toilet dirty avoided taking bath quality food poor advantage location

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Aeradyo Inn
address: Gas Godam Laxmeshwar, JM57+R7C landmark, Laxmeshwar, Dharanaula, Almora, Almora Range, Uttarakhand 263601, India

reviews.text:
Spent a great weekend there.. The staffs were attentive and polite. Special mention for the food which we ordered for dinner was really tasty.

The view from our room was great too. But we had front facing balcony so we could see the great view.

Location of the hotel is also easily accessible. Must admit that they a big underground parking lot, one of the reasons why we chose and stayed in the hotel.

Major attractions are also nearby the hotel.

It was a good stay and a family hotel.

The best hotel near mall road in almora. Location is excellent and the view from the room is excellent. The best part is the restaurant which serves sumptuous food.
Mall road distance: 1.5km
Easily accessible to all amenities

Location is almost 1.5 km from Mall road which is very far on hills by foot. Other than that, everything was good. The rooms were spacious and clean, and the bathroom too. A wide parking area is also available which is the most suitable thing for me otherwise searching for a parking space in hilly areas is the most difficult thing. But a little bit costly.
Stayed at hotel with family.Very good hotel and location superb. Food, cleanliness, hospitality everything was good.

An excellent place to stay with some really good food at the restaurant. Vies from the front facing balcony rooms amazing you can gaze at the complete valley, sunset golden line is something not to miss.
Staff is really generous and helpful. A good parking space available at the hotel. Cleanliness and washroom hygiene is top notch.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shivalik-Best Himalayan View Hotel In Almora
address: L.R.Sah Road, near Vishal Mega Mart, Dharanaula, Almora, Uttarakhand 263601, India

reviews.text: Rooms are spacious with balcony. We had a pretty view from balcony. Room and bathroom was clean. Hot water was available 24hr.
Worst room..& food is very bad taste.overcharhing very high..ise acha kise guest house meh stay karna

First of all no one is in the Reception at the first time. Very poor facility and staff behaviour is very bad. They don't have sence how to talk to the customers.
Overall very bad experience.

Except location. This property does not qualify for a hotel. It's a trap. Great pics on hotel booking app. But when you reach rooms smell like he'll, bugs everywhere, cockroaches,spiders, stained bed sheet, filthy sofa, doors windows balcony. LIFTS/AC/TV not working. But they charge you for it 3000 plus INR per night. Rude unprofessional argumentary hotel staff. No tea glass or electric jug in rooms. They ask u to go to kitchen which is also unhygenic to order ur tea food. No intercom. One should  report to govt. authority to shut it down.

In one word ‘CHEAP’. No one cares to pick up your luggage, Nobody was at the reception even I called before coming. Stairs and Corridor floor are dirty and cheap in appearance. The room has dirty blankets, The noisy and cheap springs in the bedding will give you back pain. Room service is really bad. You have to literally find them to serve you. The only positive is the view and market location. Its a complete waste of such a big property. The owner seriously needs to rethink about the cleanliness, staff and renovation.

places_with_reviews.name: The Mountain Paradise Resort
address: Papsarsali, Binsar, Road, Hawal Bagh, Almora, Uttarakhand 263601, India

reviews.text: Staying at Mountain Paradise Hotel in Almora was an absolute delight! The food was not only delicious but also made with fresh, locally sourced ingredients, adding to the authenticity of the experience. The breathtaking views of the surrounding mountains from the hotel were simply mesmerizing, making every meal a feast for the eyes as well. Additionally, the rooms were clean, comfortable, and provided a cozy retreat after a day of exploring the beautiful surroundings. Highly recommend this hotel for anyone seeking a perfect blend of great food, stunning views, and comfortable accommodation in the heart of nature.

Good hotel Food Quality Very yummy staff Behaviour good and very friendly  All Rooms Balcony views Hotel manager Good coprate Thanks to All services Next time Dircet contact to Hotel Booking Mountain paradise...

I would not recommend to visit anyone to this hotel(specially cottages). Insects were in bathrooms..rooms and bedsheets were Not clean.. Food and service was excellent.. Rakhi yadav one of the office members  in delhi were so rude she was not listening to the feedback as well she didn't even share link for posting review as well.. One of the worst experience..

Amazing hotel. Very clean and well organized
Staffs are very nice and cooperative
Beautiful property with tasty and delicious food... The rooms are  neat and clean...

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Heritage
address: Near M.E.S, Main Road, Khatyari, Almora, Sarso, Uttarakhand 263601, India

reviews.text: Pleasant stay, very beautiful lawn around the heritage building. View is amazing from the lawn. Quiet & peaceful. once. Experience in this hotel was just awesome. So cooperative & polite staff. Rooms are wonderful & are spacious enough. Food is tasty. View from the terrace & also from rooms is amazing. Pricing is also reasonable. Wonderful experience. One should must visit atleast
Room and location around are exceptionally good. Himalayan peak Views just from the hotel big lawn is eye catching.  Staff is courteous and food is reasonable.

Horrible hotel and experience. Owner was rude and non available in hotel. Manager gives owner number for any issue and owner then talks rudely. Not fit for hotel industry and customer service.
I booked hotel through make my trip. Hotel is off route, almost 2km from main Mall road.no vehicle is allowed here. My parents were old and I had kids travelling with us. We walk the entire 2 km. No number information on Google and elsewhere. Nobody in the vicinity knows about the hotel. We were do frustrated as hotel was non contactable. That's why I think they put NON REFUNDABLE in their policy. Room. Provided to us was different from what booked. Rooms were unclean and dusted and not worth of the tariff.
Horrible experience. The only black stain in our ALMORA trip.
Beware before you book this hotel
Overall a really good experience, great views and good service. Also, the hotel provides a vintage vibe, if you like historical architecture of British times, you will love the place.

Hotel Heritage Almora is the perfect destination for those seeking a scenic view with heritage-style ambience. Located conveniently on Mall road, this hotel offers plenty of parking space for your vehicles. You can take in the beauty of its sprawling lawn, which promises to make any photo taken here look absolutely picturesque!
Rooms are specious and room service is great.staffs are very friendly and they give special assistance for kids and elderly.
Hotel arranged taxi/ cab  for local sight seeing which is very pocket friendly and driver Thapa ji was good.even one can get drop service to kausani or ranikhet  or nainital from Hotel.
Great place to stay

places_with_reviews.name: Sunita Elite by Xperience
address: Mall Rd, opposite K.M.O.U Bus Station, near SBI Bank, Paltan Bazar, Dharanaula, Almora, Sarso, Uttarakhand 263601, India

reviews.text: It's in the heart of the Almora market. Spent 1 night with family. Room was with Morden facilities and views form the room was stunning.  Main lift from the reception was not working so needed to walk long as well as needed to climb some steps. Service was good. Food was okay okay type not great. Overall good experience

If you are planning on a trip to almora by your own vehicle where parking is a literal constraint, then you need a hotel with parking & that said & depending upon your budget, this hotel checks most of the requirements.

It is just located on the main mall road as you enter almora & offers inhouse restaurant, attached bar & decent rooms for family.Food quality is very good with reasonable cost, service is fast.It even had a thick book for tourist attractions at nearby places.

Location is prime & just into the main market so if you want to explore any nearby markets even after evening, you have the liberty. however nearby markets are not worthy  but thats a diferent story.

From here you can get bus , taxi etc for travel to nearby tourist attractions as on some roads big vehicles might be an issue.

Rooms are clean, reception staff honest & humble & i liked my stay here.

Infact just to quote..i paid one day charges extra & i remembered it after i left almora.Still the reception staff arranged & reversed my surplus payment.So thats something commendable.

However if you want a lonely sight seeing place , morning fresh air & views, solace...then search further.

It's a great experience with sunita ellite almora value for money, it was clean, stylish comffy rooms with excellent service iin where I had a dinner food was delicious and the staff are polite and well behaved specially Mr. Karan, great ambience wiith great view sure I will visit again soon with my family
Awesome hotel. Ample car parking space and very supportive staff.
Excellent stay .polite staff nd good food .must stay in almora .rooms are clean nd well furnished.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Himadri
address: Inter College, Udaldunga, Mall Rd, near Almora, Khatyari, Almora, Khagmara Kote, Uttarakhand 263601, India

reviews.text: View from hill facing rooms are nice but overall experience is not good at all. More yhan 85% food items in the menu were not available. Rooms and blankets were not clean enough. We had to ask them to change the pillow covers and blanket cover as it was smelling of deodorant used by the previous boarder. Dustbin in the washroom was dirty as well.

This is a budget hotel near vivekanand college located at starting of mall road. Main mall road is around 1.5 KMs far from here.

We booked deluxe room for 2 adults and 2 children under 6 years age. Rooms and washroom were neat and clean with good mattress.

Staff and management was helpful.

Tariff was economical. 1568 for deluxe room including taxes.

Mall road was at walking distance. We did walk to mall road in evening.

We got the room at back side so did not get any view from room.

Ample covered parking space for 6 to 8 cars so you do not have to worry about parking.

Food was average and there is a lot of scope for improvement. Maybe the owners need to talk to chef about food quality. Pricing of food was reasonable.

All in all, a good hotel with very reasonable tariff if you are not looking for luxury stay.

Average hotel in Kausani. Location is nice. View of Himalaya mountains is great. But the hotel itself is average. Rooms are small with bad lighting. Also rooms are not hygienic. The feel good is not in the room. We reached late in Kausani so we had no choice but to go for it. The main pros for this place are
1. Great view of Himalaya and
2. Easy to reach.
3. Hotel owner was very humble and kind
Cons for this place
1. Small rooms with bad lighting
2. Not hygienic
3. Room service is below average

•Rooms and washrooms are spacious and clean.
•Mattresses are comfortable.
•Heaters and blowers here mostly do not work.
•Food isn't good as such. The kitchen closes at 9 or 10 pm.
•There are spacious wardrobes.
•Services are fine. Recommended for short stay.
•Selected staff is nice and well-behaved. The people at reception are quite pestering.
•I had dropped my earphones here at the terrace by mistake which got stolen later. So, this place remains less reliable for me.
• No WiFi available.

We booked room via agoda , when we reached ,  there was a person sitting in reception told us that they do not accept bookings from agoda.
And He directly said no to us, and when I asked about refund he told me to ask agoda for that.

After intervention from local administration he asked his manager to send the mail immediately.

We have no choice other than stay there as it was evening. He told us only executive room worth 2000 is available.
The room was dirty , towels were not clean and worst things there were cockroaches everywhere, When we complained same to that man he told guest throw away foods here and there so there may be cockroaches.

The owner of property does not reside there , they should hire some professionals to take care of property.

places_with_reviews.name: Mehra Cottage
address: lower mall road Roadways workshop Almora Bus terminal, Paltan Bazar, Dharanaula, Almora, Uttarakhand 263601, India

reviews.text:
Experience Tranquility at Mehra Cottage, Almora, Uttarakhand

Nestled amidst the breathtaking landscapes of Almora, Mehra Cottage is a serene haven that embodies the essence of a perfect getaway. From the moment you step foot into this charming abode, you're greeted with unparalleled warmth and hospitality that rivals the comfort of home.

The staff at Mehra Cottage stands out for their remarkable cooperation and genuine care, ensuring that every guest feels like family. Their attentive service creates an atmosphere of ease and relaxation, making your stay a delightful experience.

The owner's presence adds a personal touch to your visit. Their dedication to ensuring guests' satisfaction is evident in every aspect of the cottage. Whether offering local insights, arranging activities, or simply ensuring your comfort, their friendly demeanor and helpful nature elevate your stay to an unforgettable level.

The cottage itself exudes a rustic charm combined with modern amenities, offering a perfect balance between comfort and a traditional mountain retreat. Each room is meticulously designed, providing a cozy ambiance that resonates with the surrounding natural beauty.

The location is simply breathtaking, allowing you to immerse yourself in the tranquility of the Uttarakhand hills. The scenic views from Mehra Cottage are mesmerizing, inviting you to unwind and rejuvenate amidst nature's embrace.

For those seeking solace, beauty, and exceptional hospitality, Mehra Cottage in Almora, Uttarakhand, is an absolute gem. It's a place where every moment becomes a cherished memory, leaving you longing to return to its serene embrace time and again.

I along with my family recently stayed at this property for two days. The stay was excellent, staff is so courteous which made us comfortable and create the perfect environment. The food was the perfect end to our day.
The vast cottage is situated at lower Mall road where one can enjoy the nature. There  were rare species of birds.  The owner  also very humble. You enjoy a spectacular view from terrace of cottage, mountains and greenery around. Most important night view of Almora and nearby area from this cottage is precious thing during whole stay. There is enough space on terrace of cottage for kids to spent there vacation time and enjoy the nature. You can click and retain specious memories from there. I would like to visit and stay here again and highly recommend to my friends and family.

Worst experience I’ve ever had.
The photos and property that is shown are wrong. This is just a small house with 2 floors  and this is not a hotel. This homestay is not for family and the vibes are so bad that it is difficult to even stay there for a minute.
The rooms are so small and very bad hygiene even the attitude of the receptionist was so rude that shows too much negativity.

* The other mentioned reviews are fake and paid

The place is absolute value for money. Their homestay has a vibe that will make you wanna come back to Almora. Shankar bhaiya and Mehra uncle are super hospitable and friendly. It's a budget stay so do not compare with the luxury ones. They have a super homely vibe. They have open terrace where you can party and eat your meals just right outside the rooms. It is well decorated and lit. They also have local food available at a very reasonable price. It was a absolute delight to stay Mehra cottage.
Worth the price, good food and the most important thing is the hospitality they provide is great. No overcharges were there. Overall a good recommended place to stay.

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Shivalik River Retreat
address: River Point, Kosi, NH-87, Dhamuwa Kanala, Uttarakhand 263643, India

reviews.text: Hotel placed at excellent location . having good & cozy rooms with good space . we stayed there for 2 days .staff is very good & supportive . food served was delicious & fresh. i recommend stay  for family's too. there family rooms are very good . if i visit again i will love to stay there.

We stayed at Shivalik for one night (25-Nov). The rooms are very spacious, cozy and neat-clean. Kosi river flows along the property, making it a cooler place, with a temple around as well facilitating a serene vibe.
Besides, the staff is pretty supportive and generous. Food is good too. Great service. Had a worthy stay.

I visited this property with my family and pet (Siberian husky) . The staff was well mannered and the owner was welcoming. Food here was delicious especially mouthwatering mint chutney. The open terrace has a beautiful view of the kosi river and shiv Mandir. It's a divine and peaceful experience. Will visit soon and will surely recommend.

Had a stay 5 days out here as we had to attend training at VPKAS, Hawalbagh, Almora. The rooms were nice and clean. Basic necessities were provided. The staffs were great. The foods provided were also great. They catered the food according to our tastes and appetite as most of the trainees got sick or upset stomach due to the terrain and weather. The location is 12 kms away from Almora town near to the river Kosi and walkable distance from Kosi Bazar around 1.5 kms. Grocery shops, SBI Bank and ATM are available within the vicinity of the hotel. WiFi is available 30 Mbps max download. Transportation to Almora town can done through share taxis, buses etc. Overall had a great stay, u can book the hotel for good stay.

Note: The entrances of the hotel will be closed after 9:00-10:00 pm
Had a great stay at Hotel for 5 long days. Staff were warm and humble providing necessary services as per our need. View from the hotel were scenic

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel Milam Inn
address: Upper link Road, Tilakpur, near GGIC School, near Allahabad Bank, Paltan Bazar, Dharanaula, Almora, Uttarakhand 263601, India

reviews.text:
Staff isn't good. Need to learn 'Hospitality'
Location is good though, have good parking space. However in terms of vacation, not much recommended. TV broken, Very late service for tea and water in the morning. Food is fine though.

Very good place to live here, near and clean rooms, good room service, they also serve veg and non veg dishes view side rooms, owner Mr Bisht and other staff members r very good and soft spoken, you will get value of your money

This is the restaurant in Hotel Milam Inn. Even though it looks good the food worst 👎👎👎. We ordered our food at 6:00 pm in evening and we got our dinner at 11:00 at night, can you just imagine. We ordered egg chow mein, chicken manchurian, kashmiri alu dum and fried egg.
You won't believe that the chow mein had such nasty smell that you would feel like vomiting but still as I ordered it I decided to taste it. But the moment I put it in my mouth I literally spit it out,  it was so slimy and nasty . As it was egg chow mein there is supposed to be egg in it but to be honest I didn't find a single piece of egg in it.
When I complained them they totally rejected it. My blood was boiling out of anger.

The Chicken Manchurian, you expect it to have gravy , but they provided us with dry chicken sticks. Still we accepted it but the chicken was so hard and tasteless that 5 piece of chicken was wasted.
Can you just imagine how the food was😫😫.
These were the main problems and other than these , the fried eggs were raw, we found strands of hair in our food and etc.

Overall it was a horrible experience literally horrible.

You would find my review very long and boring but  PLEASE!! I request you to read it before dining here.
Don't repeat my mistake and don't waste your money.
It's my earnest request to you all.
Thank you.

Worst experience ever.
No geyser or hot water facility after requesting several times.
Worst washroom.
No exhaust fan.Absolutely pathetic.
It was a pleasant experience, service and proper hygiene was there. Heart of the city
